太扯了吧。老百姓就喜欢阴谋论。
宫本茂在公共场合提过很多次横井君平。在社长问里、卫报、时代杂志上都谈论过，而且是很正面的。
比如时代杂志上说过：
"ideas that can be enjoyed", so that way of thinking is like a philosophy established by Mr. Yokoi It feels like it.
Mr. Yokoi was observing Nintendo 's way of thinking calmly one step. When I was young, we had a desire to go forward as soon as possible. At that time, Mr. Yokoi advised us "We need to look closely, we step down one step and observe everything." That way we learned the importance of shaping ideas from Mr. Yokoi. The person who always wants to tell the opposite thing to someone in Japanese is called "Amakusaku." What we are going to do is not to become an "obscenity", but if everyone says the same thing, we need to scruple the situation with a little doubt, I have grown like that.
This is not a story that Mr. Yokoi is always opposed to new technology. Mr. Yokoi wants to take in new technology and just looks at it all day long. For example, when Mr. Yokoi got an object floating with a magnet, he puts it on the desk and just watches, plays, and observes. Because I am such a person, I think many people have trusted Mr. Yokoi.
卫报上问过他：谁对你的职业生涯影响最大。
他也回答过：From a design perspective, Gunpei Yokoi.
社长问有关3ds的时候，提到vb，他也说过横井君平的往事。
在别的杂志上也提到过和横井君平一起设计水管马里奥兄弟的事情。
倒是什么争夺资源、清洗老人之类的。有实锤吗？我倒是真的好奇。怕不是脑补的。

不太一样吧，首先纸马是马里奥的ip，宫本茂有绝对话语权。其次老纸马是故事取向rpg，跟pm没啥可比性。
宫本茂有一点想法很正常，纸片马里奥的确应该有纸的要素（贴纸、画纸撒颜料、折纸），不如说纸马无印那样纸片只是画风作为任地狱游戏才比较奇怪（反过来说纸马作为优秀的rpg系列，如果不是有名字里倒霉催的有纸片俩字可能也不会被这么死折腾）。要套在pm上的话，可能跟pm们的互动会是强化重点吧，另外按任地狱的习惯应该是弱化硬核对战保证流程质量。
